meanings.sent1: The rubber band is very stretchable.
meanings.sent2: The fabric is stretchable, allowing for easy movement.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a stretchable bridge out of spaghetti, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as stretchable as a rubber band, always able to handle more.
meanings.sent5: The balloon animal artist amazed us with his stretchable creations.

meanings.definition: Able to be extended or expanded.
meanings.sent1: The stretchable cord reached across the room.
meanings.sent2: The budget is stretchable, so we can adjust it as needed.
meanings.sent3: The stretchable truth became more exaggerated with each retelling.
meanings.sent4: His influence was as stretchable as the universe, reaching far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The possibilities are endless with such a stretchable imagination.
